text: "Better Things" is a 1981 song by British band The Kinks and was taken from their 19th studio album Give the People What They Want. It went to number 92 in the United States and number 46 in the United Kingdom. It was their first single to chart in the United Kingdom since 1972. == References == Category:1981 songs Category:Pop songs Category:The Kinks songs Category:Pearl Jam songs
title: Better Things (song)
